text:
features. You can do this by specifying a tuple to the input shape argument. For example, the
model below deﬁnes an input layer that expects 1 or more samples, 3 time steps, and 1 feature.
Remember, the ﬁrst layer in the network is actually the ﬁrst hidden layer, so in this example 32
refers to the number of units in the ﬁrst hidden layer. The number of units in the ﬁrst hidden
layer is completely unrelated to the number of samples, time steps or features in your input
data.
